message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not sure I can meet you at $90. How about we meet at $110 instead?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to consider $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. How about we meet at $115?
I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back and forth, but I'm still interested in the product. How about we meet at $105? I'm willing to compromise a bit more.
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. How about we meet at $112?
I'm not sure I'm willing to go any higher than $108. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. How about we meet at $115 again? I'm willing to revisit this price one more time
I'm not willing to go any higher than $110. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to walk away.
